branches.name: Main Branch
branches.timings: Mon-Fri: 9:30 AM to 4:30 PM, Sat: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM

branches.name: RS Puram Branch
branches.timings: Mon-Fri: 9:30 AM to 4:30 PM, Sat: 9:30 AM to 1:30 PM

personal_loan.name: Personal Loan
personal_loan.eligibility: Salaried individuals with minimum ₹25,000 monthly income

education_loan.name: Education Loan
education_loan.tenure: Course duration + 1 year moratorium + 10 years repayment
education_loan.eligibility: Admission to recognized institution in India or abroad

modi_scheme.name: Modi Scheme
benefits: Lower interest rates for first-time home buyers
modi_scheme.eligibility: First-time home buyers with annual income below ₹18,00,000
modi_scheme.application: Apply through any CGBank branch with income proof and property documents

pm_farmer_scheme.name: PM Farmer Scheme
benefits: Credit guarantee for loans up to ₹1,60,000
pm_farmer_scheme.eligibility: All farmers with valid land records
pm_farmer_scheme.application: Apply through CGBank's agricultural loan department

thangamagal_scheme.name: Thangamagal Scheme
thangamagal_scheme.eligibility: All women above 18 years of age
thangamagal_scheme.application: Visit any CGBank branch with valid ID and address proof

greetings: How can I assist you with your banking needs today?
Welcome to CGBank! How may I help you?
Hello! I'm Rexa, your banking assistant. What can I do for you?
thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
Happy to help! Let me know if you need anything else.
My pleasure! Don't hesitate to ask if you have more questions.
balance_inquiry: As of today, your account balance is ₹{balance:,.2f}.
You have ₹{balance:,.2f} available in your account.
fund_transfer: To transfer funds, please go to the 'Transfer Money' section in your dashboard.
I can help you initiate a fund transfer. Please provide the recipient details and amount.
Fund transfers can be done through our mobile app or internet banking. Would you like instructions?
bill_payment: You can pay your bills in the 'Pay Bills' section. Would you like me to take you there?
I see you have some upcoming bills. Would you like to pay them now?
Bill payments are easy with CGBank. You can pay utilities, credit cards, and more.

student_account.name: Student Account
student_account.features: Zero balance account, Special education loans, Discounts on student services

NRI_account.name: NRI Account
NRI_account.features: Foreign currency support, Global banking, Higher interest rates

senior_account.name: Senior Citizen Account
senior_account.features: Higher interest rates, Priority services, Special pension benefits

regular_account.name: Regular Savings Account
regular_account.documents: PAN Card, Aadhar Card, Address Proof
regular_account.features: Basic banking services, Debit card, Net banking
